definition: to protect from wind/fangfeng (Saposhnikovia divaricata), its root used in TCM
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The utility model thoroughly solves the wind-proof problem and the slide-proof problem; heavy equipment can not be damaged by the utility model.
sentences.chinese: 徹底解決了防風抗滑問題，保住重大設備不受損失。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anti-inflammatory effect of Fangfeng and Huangqin decoction in animals.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究防風黃芩湯的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a windproof airer which comprises a hanger (6).
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型是一種防風晾衣架。

sentences.english: Results:Lay out the up to date research progress of Saponikovia cata(Turcz. )Schischk.
sentences.chinese: 結果展示了中藥防風的最新研究進展。

sentences.english: Objective To explore whether PT can be used as good medicine as SD.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討竹節防風能否作正品防風入藥。

sentences.english: Objective To explore whether PT can be used as good medicine as SD.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討竹節防風能否作正品防風入藥。

sentences.english: Alternate strips planted to crops each year serve as windbreaks for the fallow strip.
sentences.chinese: 每年播種作物的輪種帶可用作休耕帶的防風林。

sentences.english: Windbreaks not only protect land and crops from the wind.
sentences.chinese: 防風林不僅可以保護土地和農作物免受風災。

sentences.english: A reversed phase HPLC method was described for determination of psoralen in Saposhnikovia divaricata (Turcz.
sentences.chinese: 採用反相高效液相色譜法測定防風中補骨脂素的含量。

sentences.english: Priority should be given to the natural vegetation restoration through enclosure when establishing windbreak system here.
sentences.chinese: 防風固沙林體系的建設應突出天然植被的封育管護。

sentences.english: There should be at least two lines in each windbreak .
sentences.chinese: 在每個防風林中應該至少有兩條防線。

sentences.english: But here is something interesting about windbreaks.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這裏有一些關於防風林有趣的現象。

sentences.english: Jeans, T-shirts and a wind-proof jacket constitute a perfect outfit for ordinary outing.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔，T恤衫和防風夾克是日常行裝的完美組合。

sentences.english: Windbreaks help prevent the loss of soil.
sentences.chinese: 防風林有助於防止土壤流失。

sentences.english: An imposing pine grove formed a windbreak along the edge of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 宏偉的松樹林沿着花園組成了一面防風牆。

sentences.english: One method of soil conservation is the use of windbreaks.
sentences.chinese: 土壤養護的辦法之一是利用防風林。

definition: donkey-hide gelatin (used in TCM)/Taiwan pr. [a1 jiao1]
to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
to defend against the cold/to keep warm
